table_utils.sql_template: SELECT UNIQUE_ID, FO_TRADE_REF, OPS_SETTLEMENT_TRADE_REF, ADDITIONAL_TRADE_REF, OPERATIONS_TRADE_REF, EXTERNAL_TRADE_REF, TML_TRD_REF, LINKED_TRD_REF, ORIG_TRD_REF_NO, STOCK_RECORD_TRADE_REF, COB_DATE, SETTLEMENT_DATE_CONTRACTUAL, SOURCESYSTEM, TRADE_DATE, TRADE_ENTRY_DATE, CUSIP_CODE, COUNTERPARTY_MNEMONIC, QUANTITY_CONTRACTUAL, AMT_CONTRACTUAL_USD, SETTLEMENT_CURRENCY, TRADER_ID, TRADER_NAME, SALESPERSON_ID, SALESPERSON_NAME, COUNTERPARTY_NAME, PRE_SETL_AGE_BAND, PRE_SETL_AGE_BND_1, PRE_SETL_AGE_BND_2, ISIN_CODE, FIRM_MNEMONIC, PRICE FROM CSMARTBSER.FAILS_REPORTS_HISTORY WHERE COB_DATE BETWEEN '01-Aug-2012' AND '31-Aug-2012'
